Text: I forgot to mention that True Crime Streets of LA works for Windows XP, Vista and Windows 7 (32 bit and 64 bit, tested).
And guys remember to seed the torrent after it's done!

A slightly older but really great game!
Cool to be able to cruise a big part of LA.
